tierData.name: Takenaka Shigeharu
tierData.pros:
* Easy to slot in, works with almost all comps
* With high enough investment, frees up Healer slot
 * Lets you breeze through early/mid game
tierData.cons:
* Shields can be dispelled
* Practically forces a + formation
tierData.notes:
* Needs 4\* for added consistency
* Might fall off in very late game due to shield getting 1 shot

tierData.name: Octavius
tierData.pros:
* Main Dmg Dealer for a lot of the early/mid game
* Good Synergy with other Wind Units due to knockup
*
tierData.cons:
* Good Synergy conversely means she is dependant on team
* EE30 is underwhelming compared to other units
tierData.notes: * UR of her gets added later on

tierData.name: DaVinci
tierData.pros:
* Crucial for Knockup Comp with Octa
* At 4*, always send an enemy flying with normal attacks
tierData.cons:
* Very Speed dependant
* Without high strength Octa not as good
* Chance for Silence low at 25%
tierData.notes: * UR of her gets added later on

tierData.name: Robin Hood
tierData.pros:
* Entwining very strong overall, espc in PvP
 P1 even procs when allies die
* Wind Chain makes it easier to kill crucial targets in middle/back column
tierData.cons:
* Not effective against bosses
* EE30+ not that useful apart from certain enemy pvp comps
* Random targeting

tierData.name: Huang Zhong
tierData.pros: * Highest Boss DPS overall (for now)
tierData.cons:
* Outside of bossing, very underwhelming
* Needs good crit badges

tierData.name: Hua Tuo
tierData.pros:
* ATK Buff useful everywhere
* Pretty much best general healer
tierData.cons: * Only cleanses 1 debuff from team

tierData.name: Miyamoto Musashi
tierData.pros:
* EE+S1 stacks well for long battles
* Dodge for 2 turns is fairly good in PvP
* Works well enough in a dodge team
tierData.cons: * Fairly RNG dependant

tierData.name: Shakespeare
tierData.pros:
* Decent tank for early/mid game
* Decent Synergy with Octa
tierData.cons:
* Nothing stands out for her
* EE is awful.

tierData.name: Benkei
tierData.pros:
* Dodge Buff can help team
* yeah idk she's just bad lol
tierData.cons: * Weaken Status has low chance and targets middle/back column - where your team might not even reach

tierData.name: Mozart
tierData.pros:
* Highest DEF and HP of all wind units
* Skill recovery even works when silenced
tierData.cons: * Doesnt offer anything special, she's the vanilla flavor of wind

tierData.name: Minamoto no Yoshitsune
tierData.pros: * One of the few Buff Dispel sources
tierData.cons:
* Random targeting makes it inconsistent
* Abysmal base ATK

tierData.name: Merlin
tierData.pros:
* S2 procs a sum of ALL burn marks to ALL enemies - undodgeable
* P1 can help Crit-starved Phys Attackers
tierData.cons: * Needs to be in burn comp - Honda and/or Mich needed
tierData.notes:
* Chiyo goes brrr
* A lot of story bosses are burn-able

tierData.name: Napoleon
tierData.pros:
* High base ATK and Speed
* One of few sources of Armor Pierce
* Can punish 3 back-row formation heavily
tierData.cons:
* S1 underwhelming
* EE and P1 are 'win more' - if you dont kill anyone, its useless; if you are killing some anyway, you likely are winning anyway

tierData.name: Izumo no Okuni
tierData.pros:
* Synergizes well with crit team
* Is a potent healer
tierData.cons:
* Needs high HP pool since she sacrifices it
* Needs constant Crits

tierData.name: Oda Nobunaga
tierData.pros:
* Self-heal and 50% chance to be immune to debuffs
* Decent balance of Offense and Defense
tierData.cons: * She doesnt excel in Offense or Defense

tierData.name: Watt
tierData.pros: * Primarily used to cheese bosses via P1
tierData.cons: * Abysmal Stats

tierData.name: Michelangelo
tierData.pros:
* US is bread&butter
* Every action adds 1 Burn Mark to all enemies
* Highest DEF&HP in fire
tierData.cons: * Needs high SPD
tierData.notes:
* Pretty much needs 4* for US to proc at start
* A lot of story bosses are burn-able

tierData.name: Lancelot
tierData.pros: * US procs all burn marks immediately - undodgable
tierData.cons: * EE and P1 are 'win more' - see Lancelot

tierData.name: Honda Tadakatsu
tierData.pros:
* Key Unit in Burn Comps
* Very high base DEF that gets boosted even further
* One of few sources of Realm - stuns everyone fairly quickly in a burn comp
tierData.cons: * Very weak to Cleansers

tierData.name: Copernicus
tierData.pros:
* One of the few Buff Dispel Sources - coupled with preventing to gain heals/buffs
* Stun from US can be cleansed before proc
* Adds consistency to CC bosses
tierData.cons:
* Needs a cleanser on team
* US only targets one ally
* P1 only 60% chance

tierData.name: Yagyu Jubei Mitsuyoshi
tierData.pros: * Good for clean-up since P1 chains her S1
tierData.cons: * A 'win more' unit, since you need to kill to get her full power

tierData.name: Helen of Troy
tierData.pros:
* Counter to Burn Comps
* One of the few cleansers
* The only Revive Unit - they can even act directly after
* Very slow base SPD helps her here, since you want cleanse to be last
tierData.cons: * If no ally dies and no Status Effects in enemy team, pretty useless

tierData.name: Remus
tierData.pros:
* Very SPD focused unit
* Only unit with Slow status effect
* Works well together with Himiko
tierData.cons: * Very few comps/units need this, so she is rather underwhelming

tierData.name: Columbus
tierData.pros:
* Only unit with Blind Status Effect
* Stacks Crit&Dodge over time
tierData.cons:
* Any Buff Dispel on enemy renders her useless
* Needs high SPD to act first to get extra damage

tierData.name: Akechi Mitsuhide
tierData.pros:
* Main DPS in Freeze Comps
* S1 attacks middle- and back-column, while S2 even attacks all enemies
tierData.cons:
* Only shines if enemy is frozen
* EE kinda underwhelming, with a 50% chance

tierData.name: Romulus
tierData.pros:
* Highest HP/DEF in water
* Initial Frost Marks help decide fights
* Shield from US is heavy Damage Reduce
tierData.cons:
* Needs to be in freeze comp
* Needs speedy team to take advantage of P1
* Susceptible to Status Effects, where Shield is useless

tierData.name: Artemis
tierData.pros: * Every attack adds Frost Marks, so staple in Frost Comp
tierData.cons: * Apart from Freeze, she doesnt offer more

tierData.name: Morgana
tierData.pros:
* One of few sources of Silence and Cleanse
* P1 can be very potent for later bosses
tierData.cons:
* Silence & Cleanse Chance not 100%
* Low base SPD, but wants to go first to silence

tierData.name: Zhen Ji
tierData.pros:
* Reliable source of Buff Dispel
* US very versatile, mostly 'doubling' DPS damage
tierData.cons: * Dispel targets are random
tierData.notes: * Only dispels one Buff per hit, which can be bad in some specific stages (such as GA45+)

tierData.name: Darwin
tierData.pros:
* Highest ATK buff overall in ideal situation (300% for team)
* Protects allies indirectly
* Turtles give DEF debuff
tierData.cons: * Susceptible to AoEs

tierData.name: Chiyome Mochizuki
tierData.pros:
* 3 dodges per turn make her very 'tanky'
* Clones of her mimic all her actions
tierData.cons:
* Susceptible to multi-attacks
* Susceptible to Burn Stacks (Merlin US)

tierData.name: Zhao Yun
tierData.pros: * Decent mix of offense and defense
tierData.cons: * Doesnt excel at either offense or defense

tierData.name: Hugo
tierData.pros:
* S1 Damage based on %HP of enemy
* Passive Enemy SPD decrease on EE
* Pairs well with Tamamo EE
tierData.cons:
* No instant damage
* Stun chance only 60%

tierData.name: Tokugawa Ieyasu
tierData.pros:
* Only source of Tear
* Very durable due to dodge with EE
tierData.cons:
* Low base HP and fairly low DEF kinda screw her up
* A few fair counters to her

tierData.name: Xu Chu
tierData.pros: * Good source of Armor Pierce
tierData.cons:
* EE very underwhelming
* Low chance to stun

tierData.name: Tamamo-no-Mae
tierData.pros:
* Very reliable source of damage with EE
* Very good synergy with Units that give debuff at start of battle
* Very high base SPD
tierData.cons: * US only 40% chance to silence
tierData.notes: * Needs EE30+ to really be good

tierData.name: Raphael
tierData.pros:
* Good Synergy with Hate Marks
* Comeback and 'win more' mechanic both
tierData.cons:
* Random targets on S1
* Damage isnt the highest and conditional
tierData.notes: * P1 gets more value vs enemy summons

tierData.name: Taishi Ci
tierData.pros:
* US Damage is % of current enemy HP
* Focuses enemy attacker
tierData.cons: * Damage cap on US

tierData.name: Ares
tierData.pros:
* Pure tank kit
* Can shield allies and take part of their damage
* S1 makes her immune to Status Effects for 2 turns
tierData.cons: * Needs high SPD to be immune to Status Effects

tierData.name: Himiko
tierData.pros:
* Easy to fit in comps
* S1 binds a target in front of her, good to take out key targets
* Easy to shut down a target with S1
tierData.cons: * Depends a lot on speed
tierData.notes: * Very strong in GA since her Realm does %HP Damage without any conditions/CC.

tierData.name: Hannibal
tierData.pros:
* Very durable due to shield
* Thicc.
* Can stun multiple targets - good counter to Take in + formation
* Basically unkillable by Phys Dmg with EE
tierData.cons:
* Stun only 65% chance
* Susceptible to Buff Dispel

tierData.name: Mendel
tierData.pros:
* Summons can work as meatshields and increase Final DMG Reduce of adjacent allies
* Buffs are very powerful
tierData.cons:
* Random Buffs
* Buffs only last 1 turn
* EE underwhelming

tierData.name: Richard
tierData.pros:
* Easy to fit in comps, versatile
* Durable when team is alive - doubly so if team uses summons
* Good team ATK buff
tierData.cons:
* Jack of all trades, master of none
* No Status Effects
tierData.notes: Ideally wants 2* to max S1 for ATK buff

tierData.name: Da Qiao and Xiao Qiao
tierData.pros:
* S1 buffs and debuffs -> harder to shut down
* US gives one of the rare speed buffs
* Very versatile and pretty much good in any comp
tierData.cons: * Just simply no real synergy
tierData.notes: Ideally wants 3* so S1 is maxed

tierData.name: Thor
tierData.pros:
* Strong Single/AoE Dmg
* Universal for all Dragon Bosses
tierData.cons:
* No defensive skills
* Needs team support to fully utilize EE
tierData.notes: * Very expensive to pull for, since she is a limited Light unit

tierData.name: Sima Yi
tierData.pros:
* Can fit in Freeze and Burn Comps
* Highest base ATK overall
* S1 and US both attack front- and middle-row
* US can proc again if it defeats an enemy
tierData.cons:
* Rather low base HP/Def
* P1 very underwhelming

tierData.name: Dante
tierData.pros:
* P1 very useful for debuffable bosses
* Good for finishing targets with US
* Good disruption with S1
tierData.cons: * Low HP and no defensive skills
